meanings.definition: Used to express a range of emotions including surprise, disappointment, or realization.
meanings.sent1: Oh ohs! I forgot my lunch at home.
meanings.sent2: Oh, ohs! I didn't expect to see you here.
meanings.sent3: Oh ohs, I accidentally wore mismatched socks today.
meanings.sent4: The sudden rain was an oh ohs moment during our picnic.
meanings.sent5: The loud noise made me go oh ohs in surprise.

meanings.definition: A unit of measurement for the size of typefaces, equal to one twelfth of a pica.
meanings.sent1: The designer chose a font size of 12 ohs for the heading.
meanings.sent2: The book was printed in a font with tiny ohs that were hard to read.
meanings.sent3: The printer mistakenly used the wrong ohs for the body text.
meanings.sent4: The poster stood out with its bold ohs on the title.
meanings.sent5: The magazine article used ohs to emphasize key points.

meanings.definition: A way to express understanding or acknowledgment in conversation.
meanings.sent1: She nodded with a quick oh ohs to show she understood.
meanings.sent2: His frequent use of oh ohs made him a good listener.
meanings.sent3: The oh ohs from the audience indicated they were following along.
meanings.sent4: The teacher's oh ohs encouraged the students to participate.
meanings.sent5: The oh ohs in the meeting signaled a shared agreement.
